section.p: The act of accepting the role of fulfiller. This is the act of accepting a prosthetic request. The ProthetictPromise act identifies a fulfiller promise for a prosteitic transaction.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] accessionDate with data type Point In Time
The date that a transaction was entered to a system. It may be the date the transaction was initiated.

Contains exactly one [1..1] deliveryDate with data type Point In Time
The date that the order was closed.

Contains exactly one [1..1] description with data type String
A textual representation of the nature and characteristics of the item.

Contains exactly one [1..1] id with data type Id
A unique identifier for the Act (HL7 3.0)

Contains exactly one [1..1] transactionForm with data type Code
Identifies the paper form on which the transaction is tracked. Possible values include: PSC, 2237, 2421, 2431, 2474, 2520, 2529-3, 2529-7, 2914, Inventory Issue, Lab Issue-3, Stock Issue, Visa, Other.

Contains zero or one [0..1] visit, where its type is Encounter Event
An interaction between a patient and a practitioner under the auspices of a given organization for the purpose of providing healthcare-related service(s).

Contains at least one [1..*] issuedItem, where its type is Issued Item
Information pertinent to the issued for the patient.

Contains zero or one [0..1] request, where its type is Prosthetics Request
requested information about the prosthetic.

Contains exactly one [1..1] issuingLocation, where its type is Service Delivery Location
The station to which the prosthetic transaction is assigned. The station is responsible for the issue and payment for the prosthetic device.
Contains zero or more [0..*] hcpcsProcedureList, where its type is Procedure List Entry
Contains zero or more [0..*] relatedProstheticsPromise, where its type is Related Prosthetics Promise

Contains exactly one [1..1] accessionDate with data type Point In Time
The date that a transaction was entered to a system. It may be the date the transaction was initiated.

Contains exactly one [1..1] deliveryDate with data type Point In Time
The date that the order was closed.

A textual representation of the nature and characteristics of the item.

An interaction between a patient and a practitioner under the auspices of a given organization for the purpose of providing healthcare-related service(s).

Information pertinent to the issued for the patient.

Contains zero or one [0..1] request, where its type is Prosthetics Request
requested information about the prosthetic.

Contains exactly one [1..1] issuingLocation, where its type is Service Delivery Location
The station to which the prosthetic transaction is assigned. The station is responsible for the issue and payment for the prosthetic device.
Contains zero or more [0..*] hcpcsProcedureList, where its type is Procedure List Entry
Contains zero or more [0..*] relatedProstheticsPromise, where its type is Related Prosthetics Promise
